item.title: Piero Martinello published at Siteinspire
item.description: Our website for the photographer Piero Martinello featured by Siteinspire, an excellent showcase of inspiring web design and CSS gallery designed and developed by the london based studio Kulor.
item.content:encoded: Our website for the photographer Piero Martinello featured by Siteinspire, an excellent showcase of inspiring web design and CSS gallery designed and developed by the London based studio Kulor. Check it out here.

item.title: Starting to work on a project for interior designer Fernanda Gonzalez
item.description: We were commissioned by the interior designer Fernanda González based in Barcelona to develop her visual identity and her portfolio website. Fernanda has worked on very different types of projects, from small apartments to big houses and offices. To develop the general concept for her website, we wanted to understand and know better her work. [...]
item.content:encoded:
We were commissioned by the interior designer Fernanda González based in Barcelona to develop her visual identity and her portfolio website. Fernanda has worked on very different types of projects, from small apartments to big houses and offices.

To develop the general concept for her website, we wanted to understand and know better her work. As a first stage, we took the first shots of her more relevant projects. Here you can check some of the picture that will be included in her online portfolio.
